text:
I was wondering how difficult it is to develop an app, or maybe it is not necessary, to make nested lists that you can just open and see all the information.

In my case it is:

1. Anyone from the team can go to the right company
2. Select one of the countries where this company is present
3. Choose one of 4 types of services within the country
4. See the offers for a specific country and for a specific type of service.

I will be very grateful for your answer
Sabine hat mich gefragt wegen einer Integration zwischen Shopify und Sage 100. Hab ja gesagt, war das ein Fehler  :joy:?
